verbs.description: CINCINNATI ( AP ) - [ARG0: Civil rights attorneys] [V: contended] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that the Trump administration tried to rush deportations of Iraqis who faced torture , sexual slavery and even beheadings in their home country] .
